name: Vethani
description:
Nurturing Erudites
The Vethani culture shares a special relationship with all living things and finds purpose in the wilds. They carry the burden of their ancestors' crimes and have complex relationships with magic.

options.name: Antimagic
options.description: In response to a Spell being Channeled within a number of Units equal to your Level, lower the Spell Attack by 1d8. If the Spell does not require a Spell Attack, the Spell fails if the result of the d8 is 6 or higher.

options.name: Enlightener's Wisdom
options.description: Gain +1 Insight and animals trust you instinctively, never attacking unless provoked.

options.name: Natural Connection
options.description: Gain +1 Wildcraft and you can sense the health and emotions of plants within 30 units.
